isosensitivity: AUTO (Control available up to ISO3200), Equivalent to ISO 100, 200, 250, 320, 400, 500, 640, 800, 1000, 1250, 1600, 2000, 2500, 3200, 4000, 5000, 6400, 12800 (Standard Output Sensitivity)
dimensions: 100 x 58.5 x 33.3 mm (W x H x D)
type: 2/3" X-Trans II CMOS with primary colour filter
accessoriesincluded: - Li-ion battery NP-48 - AC power adaptor AC-5VT - Plug adapter - Hand strap - USB cable
effects: - SP: Portrait, Portrait Enhancer, Landscape, Sport, Night, Night (Tripod), Fireworks, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Party, Flower, Text, Underwater. Filter: Toy Camera, Miniature, Pop Colour, High-Key, Low-Key,Dynamic Tone, Soft Focus, Partial Colour (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple) - ADV: Motion Panorama 360, Pro Focus, Pro Low Light, Multiple Exposure
shutterspeed: - Auto mode: 1/4 sec. to 1/3000 sec - All other modes: 30 sec. to 1/4000 sec *up to 1/4000 sec at small aperture, up to 1/1000 sec at full aperture
exposuremodes: Programmed AE, Aperture Priority AE, Shutter Speed Priority AE, Manual exposure
whitebalance: Automatic scene recognition, Custom, Colour temperature selection (K) Preset: Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light, Underwater
